scripts.serve: cross-env runEnv=local node cli-config/bin/start && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.dev: cross-env runEnv=local node cli-config/bin/start && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.start: cross-env runEnv=local node cli-config/bin/start && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.build: cross-env runEnv=pro node cli-config/bin/start && vue-cli-service build
scripts.bd: cross-env runEnv=pro node cli-config/bin/start && vue-cli-service build && node ./upload/index.js
